p.d: Young Nancy Nguéré has discovered that, without her authorisation, her father-in-law had spent the inheritance she was due to receive from her grandparents when she came of age. She has decided to take him to court. Directed by: Anselm Nfa (Ivory Coast, season 2, 2019) Cast: Sonia Aka (judge Savhera), Fredy Alain Gires Ayemou (officer Wanderma), Dehe Ange Kader (officer Sandro) Genre: comedy drama
